resources.string: Are you sure you want to cancel this payment and go back to the merchant\'s site\?
• Authorise future payments made from your PayPal account without logging in to PayPal each time.
PayPal will first use your PayPal balance to pay for purchases. If that doesn\'t cover the total, your bank account, PayPal Credit, debit card, credit card and/or eCheque will be used in that order.
• Agree to %1$s\'s privacy policy and user agreement.
PayPal helps keep your financial information encrypted.

To cancel this agreement, go to www.paypal.co.uk, Profile > My Settings > Log In with PayPal and remove %1$s from the list. A small authorisation may be required to make sure your PayPal account can be charged in the future. The authorisation will be voided and you won\'t be charged.
